property.name: Bean_Game_Form_Text_1
property.default: To participate in this game, you’ll need to complete an online consent form and complete a fun game on your kitchen table – it all takes less than 10 minutes. We’ll mail you all of the supplies that you need to complete the activity. Just follow the instructions in the kit and send us back your results.
property.label: Bean_Game_Form_Text_1

property.name: Bean_Game_Form_Text_1_a
property.default: You can either request the Bean game kit again or submit the results
property.label: Bean_Game_Form_Text_1_a

property.name: Bean_Game_Form_Text_2
property.default: Click on the button below to learn more about the kitchen table bean game!
property.label: Bean_Game_Form_Text_2

property.name: Bean_Game_Form_Text_3
property.default: Yes, I want to lean more about the bean game!
property.label: Bean_Game_Form_Text_3

property.name: Bean_Game_Form_Text_5
property.default: Yes, Please send me the bean game again
property.label: Bean_Game_Form_Text_5
